shortdesc.ph: Resumes media stream forwarding to all destination channels.
Resumes media stream forwarding to all destination channels.
Resumes media stream relay to all destination channels.
Resumes media stream forwarding to all destination channels.

section.p: After calling the method, if you need to resume forwarding media streams to all destination channels, you can call this method.
After calling the method, you can call this method to resume media stream forwarding to all destination channels.
After calling the method, if you need to resume media stream relay to all destination channels, you can call this method.
After calling the method, if you need to resume forwarding to all destination channels, you can call this method.
section.note: You must call this method after .
You must call this method after .
This method must be called after .
You must call this method after .

section.title: Return Values

ul.li:
< 0: The method call failed. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-5: This method call was rejected. There is no paused cross-channel media stream forwarding.

< 0: The method call failed. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-5: This method call was rejected. No paused cross-channel media stream forwarding exists.

section.p:
When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Method call failed. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-5: This method call was rejected. There is no paused cross-channel media stream relay.

ul.li:
< 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-5: This method call was rejected. No cross-channel media stream forwarding is currently paused.
